title: Day 3: From Bindings to Booth
description:
Watch something long enough and certain trends start to appear. 

 Commentators Todd Richards, Todd Harris and Trond Nystad’s unique abilities are to get you closer to the action despite being 1000s of miles away from Beijing. 

 With that experience, we turn to each to figure out why their respective countries excel at the Winter Olympics. 

 Follow The Podium now on Amazon Music to get automatic downloads. And tune into the networks of NBC to watch every moment of the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympic games.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Sports)
